channel.title: Do you know someone who can help the Africa Prize innovators?
channel.description:
The [Africa Prize alumni are coming to London in September](https://medium.com/source-institute/the-africa-prize-for-engineering-is-coming-to-london-42f4a458ae1c#.dam8cnpz7). If you know anyone who can help in these categories, please email salim@source.institute. They also qualify for a free ticket for [Source Summit on September 12th](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/source-summit-humanitech-tickets-27006845201).
* industrial manufacturing * importers of insect protein * industrial sales (mines) * energy companies/suppliers * energy thought leaders * scaled enterprise software * personal productivity * agritech angel investors * powerline carrier experts * sanitation experts * WASH financial support * London landscape guide * Game making companies (2d, mobile, for both kids and adults) * import/export between African countries * African Health ministries (national, regional or county) * West African hospitals & doctors * Increasing adoption of local entrepreneurs * NGOs and individuals or organizations that are supporting volunteers * finding talent * SME software cusomer support * African diaspora * multinational FMCG brands (looking at Nigeria) * getting a head start on product while doing field tests * big sanitation contracts * worldwide intros to medium-scale farmers (for marketing)
Funding: * grants for education * WASH grants * health grants and loans

item.title: Do you know someone who can help the Africa Prize innovators?
item.dc:creator: @salim Salim Virani
item.description:
@salim wrote:

The Africa Prize alumni are coming to London in September. If you know anyone who can help in these categories, please email salim@source.institute. They also qualify for a free ticket for Source Summit on September 12th.

  • industrial manufacturing
  • importers of insect protein
  • industrial sales (mines)
  • energy companies/suppliers
  • energy thought leaders
  • scaled enterprise software
  • personal productivity
  • agritech angel investors
  • powerline carrier experts
  • sanitation experts
  • WASH financial support
  • London landscape guide
  • Game making companies (2d, mobile, for both kids and adults)
  • import/export between African countries
  • African Health ministries (national, regional or county)
  • West African hospitals & doctors
  • Increasing adoption of local entrepreneurs
  • NGOs and individuals or organizations that are supporting volunteers
  • finding talent
  • SME software cusomer support
  • African diaspora
  • multinational FMCG brands (looking at Nigeria)
  • getting a head start on product while doing field tests
  • big sanitation contracts
  • worldwide intros to medium-scale farmers (for marketing)

Funding:

  • grants for education
  • WASH grants
  • health grants and loans
